clue1_1.clue: The position of Prime Minister was created following this event, occurring on the first day of the 20th Century

clue1_2.clue: This Prime Minister held a world record for beer drinking, and maintains that it contributed to his political success

clue1_3.clue: Australia’s second Prime Minister and one of two who have had a university named after them

clue1_4.clue: He is Australia’s longest serving Prime Minister, serving a total of 18 years across 4 decades

clue1_5.clue: Harold Holt disappeared from this beach, 50 years ago last month

clue2_1.clue: 'And when I'm chilling out, she wanna ask me questions, Jeopardy. Man, I got the pussy on ...'

clue2_3.clue: 'Hey, hey, mama, said the way you move, gonna make you sweat, gonna make you groove'

clue2_5.clue: 'In the town where I was born lived a man who sailed to sea'

clue3_1.clue: In Hinduism, a shortcut to paradise is to die in this 1,560-mile river The Ganges

clue3_2.clue: It's estimated that more than 20% of the world's unfrozen fresh water is in this Siberian lake

clue3_3.clue: In Israel the area where this river exits the Sea of Galilee is considered holy

clue3_4.clue: Just 33km longer than the Mississippi River, this similarly named waterway is the longest in North America

clue3_5.clue: Perhaps Enya could tell you that part of this 1,600-mile-long river flows along the Venezuela-Colombia border

clue4_1.clue: A hot favourite morning caffinated beverage

clue4_2.clue: A member of a small independent group taking part in irregular fighting, typically against larger regular forces

clue4_3.clue: This avian-equine mythical creature, one of which features in the third installment of the Harry Potter series

clue4_4.clue: Another word for pirate, also sounds like a dollar per hearing organ

clue4_5.clue: This interaction of Aboriginal Australians with the Dreamtime through music, dance and costume

clue5_1.clue: In 'The Big Lebowski', The Dude called this cocktail a 'Caucasian'

clue5_2.clue: Your barista knows it's also called a cafetiere or a plunge-filter

clue5_3.clue: The title of a 1941 film noir based on the 1930 book of the same name, about a priceless, jewel encrusted, golden token

clue5_4.clue: A family of confections based on a gel of starch and sugar, know as ‘lokum’ in its national tongue and commonly chocolate covered in commercial versions

clue5_5.clue: Until recently in Great Britain this dog breed was known as the Alsatian

categories: The Oscar for Best Animated Feature

clue1_1.clue: A state of prolonged unconsciousness wakes up with another letter to become a punctuation mark

clue1_2.clue: Slang for a policeman; with an added letter, it becomes a fowl enclosure

clue1_3.clue: An abbreviated football official becomes a sand ridge at the water's surface

clue1_4.clue: A word meaning top-rate or excellent takes on another letter to become a meal of the day

clue1_5.clue: A long-barreled gun loads an extra letter to be a word meaning to turn pages hastily

clue2_2.clue: He declared 'A plague o' both' the houses of Montague & Capulet

clue2_3.clue: We know Antonio's job (& where he works) from the title of this comedy

clue2_4.clue: The name of this steward in 'Twelfth Night' is an approximation of the Italian for 'ill will'

clue2_5.clue: You'll find this king of Sparta & hubby of Helen in 'Troilus & Cressida'

clue3_1.clue: Completes the name of a polish by L'Oreal, 'Because You're...'

clue3_2.clue: Limited-edition shades from MAC Cosmetics were inspired by these 2 girls from the Archie comics

clue3_3.clue: OPI likes a pun: an orangey red is called 'A Roll in' this Dutch seat of government

clue3_5.clue: Hard Candy's Crystal Confetti Collection includes a red & black one named for this type of costume ball

clue5_1.clue: Risers are the vertical elements of these that you'll build to go from one level to another

clue5_2.clue: The higher the 'R' value, the higher the efficiency of this product that's used to keep the heat in

clue5_3.clue: For big jobs this can replace a hammer; the coil type has a loading capacity of 300 at a time

clue5_4.clue: Despite its (American) name, after milling & drying, this standard piece of lumber is closer to 1 1/2 inches x 3 1/2 inches

clue5_5.clue: If you want to make a construction pro crazy, instead of concrete, use this word that means a powder that's found in concrete

clue6_1.clue: This major type of the cannabis plant is know for its short, bushy stature and deep body sensation effects when smoked

clue6_2.clue: Still commonly used today, the recreational inhalation of nitrous oxide began at parties in as early as this century

clue6_3.clue: This Mexican native plant, prized for its psychoactive ingredients, is illegal in the United States, except for members of the Native American Church

clue6_4.clue: The 1950's CIA program MKUltra involved admisitering doses of this drug to a range of human subjects, often without their knowledge

clue6_5.clue: Passed away in 2014, this man was heralded as the 'Godfather of Ecstasy'

final_jeopardy.clue: First held in 1913, this event's inaugural winner was Maurice Garin with a time of 94 hours, 33 minutes, 14 seconds
